name: Sheraton Suites Calgary Eau Claire

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed there last week, Sept. 2007.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

likes.liked: — Staff, beautiful suite, location in Calgary, food, excellent value
likes.disliked: — Could not think of one thing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am a retired marketing VP and have stayed at the best hotels everywhere and I can truly say that this hotel meets the very top standards of the finest hotels.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

reviews.text: It has a terrific location and the friendliest, most efficient staff I've encountered. We also liked the valet parking and $50 food and beverage credit included in the "special" room price on the internet. We ate in the Hotel Pub for free and got top notch free valet parking service as well.
reviews.title: Great design, location and staff

likes.disliked: — Awful breakfast, although they did refund the price :-)

reviews.text: We loved the beautiful, clean suite. Although I've seen bigger suites, I've also seen smaller. This was approximately 24 feet square in total and as nice as it could possibly be.
reviews.title: Happy with the Sheraton

reviews.text: Calgary is a booming, prosperous looking city and you will surely treasure your visit there if you stay at the Sheraton Suites.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Sheraton Au Claire for 3 nights in June and as usual had a wonderful, relaxing stay. We have never even considered staying anywhere else in Calgary for the last 10 years. The beds are as comfortable as ours at home. The rooms are immaculate, spacious, have great views, and are so soundproof that we have never noticed any sounds from any other rooms or even in the hallways outside our door.
reviews.title: Fabulous stay, as always

likes.liked: — The relaxing atmosphere, outstandingly comfortable rooms, the whole Au Claire area on premise
likes.disliked: — The shower in the jacuzzi rooms doesn't have enough shelves or places to put your cleansing products. They have to sit on the floor.

reviews.text: We had booked a basic king, but the hotel upgraded us to a jacuzzi suite for the same price upon check in. The staff is helpful, extremely friendly, and go above and beyond to make sure that your stay is a great experience. The hotel is on the same grounds as a huge park with a beautiful river running through it, as well as the Au Claire Market which has restaurants, shops, theatres and always fun things happening on premise. There is a playground and wading pool outside for kids, and the hotel is pet friendly. One could spend the entire weekend in the hotel, and Au Claire area and never even have to venture any further.......but Calgary is such a great city that we still always do.
reviews.title: One sure way to make sure I don't return

likes.liked: — The bed, the smally suite for the price of a hotel room.

reviews.text: Having stayed at most every other hotel in downtown Calgary except this one, I decided to try it for a few days while making a pit stop on my trip home at xmas this year.
reviews.title: My favorite hotel in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was easy and the lobby is alright, nothing awe inspiring, but not dirty or disorganised either.
reviews.title: Definitely recommend The Sheraton

reviews.text: The rooms are nice, with the usual Sheraton bed which is wonderful. Having the small suite set-up would be a much more convenient option for a business traveller than some of the other options in the downtown so I can understand why it is popular.
reviews.title: Best place to stay
What A Great Way to End 2007
reviews.text: The relaxing experience starts at the entrance to the hotel and gets better all the time. Staff are helpful, friendly but not over the top as in some places; the rooms are incredibly clean, the fitness facilities are in excellent shape, and the space to relax is large. It has to be the best in Calgary!

reviews.title: Great location, Excellent Facility
reviews.text: Clean, good service, nice rooms. The restaurants were both pretty good, although Finn MacCool's was a bit noisy and uncomfortable for dining. Good connection to Plus-15 system and downtown.
Had a one night stay in mid-november.
reviews.title: Good stay!

likes.disliked: — $14.00 /24 hours of internet - c'mon Sheraton! It's free in alot of hotels!

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.text: Was booked into, and received, a small suite with two queen beds. This was first stay at this hotel, it is always full when I come to Calgary and I usually end up at the Delta (yuck) or the Westin (better).

The room consists of a small kitchen/desk area, leading into the "living" area with sofa and TV. The bedroom had two queen beds crammed into it, the bathroom door not quite clearing the second bed. A small bathroom "ante-room" with sink has a door leading into the toilet/shower area. I understand this set up for the suite, it just makes better sense. But - I continue to rail against the separation of sink/toilet in hotel rooms. It should all be in one room! Personal preference I guess.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Good location!
reviews.text: Very clean, nice big suite, with a compact kitchen, living room, bedroom, dressing area and bathroom. Two TV sets.

reviews.title: another nice stay, couple of problems; and park across the street
reviews.text: Well located, near restaurants and main atractions.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Helpful staff!
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: I'd surely recommend it!!
reviews.title: Nice hotel in Calgary

reviews.text: had another nice stay last month. had a couple of problems...tv was unplugged for some reason and had to climb in behind cabinet to fix it. and seemed that i was allergic to something in the room...my friends wondered about the humidifiers in the rooms, or maybe previous pet stay? hmm...
reviews.title: Excellent - Best Hotel we've stayed at!!

aka: Sheraton Suites Calgary Eau Claire Hotel Calgary
description: Whether you're visiting our Calgary Hotel for business or pleasure, you'll never feel more at home than at the all-suite four-diamond Sheraton Suites Calgary Eau Claire Hotel.
